timeline.message: feat(test): Edited CpanCliDetectableTest to extend DetectableFunctionalTest
feat(test): Added addExecutableOutputToOutputDirectory to DetectableFunctionalTest since some detectables, including cpan, extract to their output directory instead of their source directory
fix(test): Moved CpanCliDetectableTest to functional test folder, deleted tests that are redundant

timeline.author: JakeMathews
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -167,6 +167,14 @@ public void addExecutableOutput(@NotNull final ExecutableOutput executableOutput
         executableRunner.addExecutableOutput(executable, executableOutput);

replies.bodyText: to preserve the current api, how do you feel about having an addExecutableOutput that defaults the workingDirectory to sourceDirectory
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

replies.bodyText: looks in order to do this we'd either have to change the access modifiers on DetectableFunctionalTest so you can reference the directories, or just pass a boolean or enum to indicate which directory you want to add to
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

timeline.message: fix(test): Edited API of DetectableFunctionalTest::addExecutableOutput so users can specify directory to extract to
fix(test): Updated assertions in detectable tests to check for exact expected number of code locations
test-refactor(cpan-cli): Replaced full class implementations of resolvers with lambda function.
